DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate whether electrical stimulation of the nerve innervating the tear gland results in tear production in subjects with severe Dry Eye.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Electrical Stimulation on Tear Production
DOC.detailed_description: A non-randomized, open-label study designed to investigate the feasibility of a novel treatment for severe Dry Eye Disease, which involves safe delivery of small electrical currents to the lacrimal nerve to induce tear production.
